articles.title: How to Identify Soft Rot
articles.subtitle: Quick guide for orchid care
content: Soft rot is caused by Erwinia bacteria, leading to mushy leaves and stems.
High humidity and poor airflow increase susceptibility.
Cut infected areas immediately with sterilized tools.

articles.title: Anthracnose Prevention Tips
articles.subtitle: Keep your orchids healthy
content: Anthracnose is a fungal disease causing black spots on leaves.
Ensure proper air circulation and avoid wet leaves.
